name: Tic Tac Toe (itch) (Slime Arts)
description:
A 2D Mobile Game TicTacToe where I made the players can connect with their friends and play in Multiplayer Mode.

Also, the game has Singleplayer Mode you can play without an internet connection.

In the future, I am planning to add a chat box in multiplayer mode, where players can chat while playing the game.
